title: Google's Latest Layoffs Are a Huge Red Flag for GOOG Stock
text: Google (NASDAQ: GOOG ) stock hasn't benefited even after it announced it would pursue a series of layoffs, would be cutting 12,000 jobs or 6% of the total workforce. Job cuts are not new for the tech industry.

title: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Tech Stocks Tumble After Alphabet's Earnings Report
text: U.S. equities sank, pulled down by the tech sector following the earnings report from Alphabet (GOOGL) and a spike in interest rates.

title: Google's stock sheds market cap the size of Nike in one of Wall Street's five worst drops ever
text: The selloff in Alphabet Inc. shares Wednesday resulted in the fifth-largest one-day decline in market value for any U.S. company on record.

title: Alphabet sees $165 billion in market cap wiped after cloud business growth disappoints Wall Street
text: Alphabet stock dropped nearly 10% Wednesday following Tuesday's third-quarter earnings report. Google said cloud-computing revenue climbed 22% to $8.41 billion in the quarter, missing estimates of $8.64 billion.

title: Why Are Fintech Stocks Down Today?
text: Contributing to a downbeat environment on Wednesday, the financial technology (fintech) sector suffered a major blow. Worldline (OTCMKTS: WRDLY ), a French multinational payment and transactional services firm, suffered a catastrophic loss in the market due to an outlook downgrade.

title: Google's Cloud Disappointed, Microsoft's Impressed. What's In Store For Amazon?

title: Google, Nvidia invest in AI startup CentML
text: CentML – a Toronto-based AI startup has received new funding from Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ: NVDA) and Alphabet Inc's (NASDAQ: GOOGL) Google. Who else participated in the seed round?

title: Mike Johnson elected speaker, ending rudderless period for House
text: The Republican-run U.S. House of Representatives at last managed to elect a new speaker on Wednesday, backing Rep. Mike Johnson, who scored the job after failed bids this month by three other GOP lawmakers.

title: Alphabet's First Downgrade Rolls in After Earnings
text: The 22% revenue growth rate at Google Cloud came in well short of expectations.

title: Why Amazon Stock Was Down After Alphabet's News Today
text: Alphabet's Google Cloud posted lower growth than expected. Google Cloud's weak report might foretell a sluggish quarter for Amazon's cloud business.

title: Markets Mixed at Midday as Google Parent Alphabet Drags Down Tech Sector
text: U.S. equities were mixed at midday as the tech sector lost ground after Google parent Alphabet (GOOGL) reported lower-than-expected cloud revenue. The Nasdaq fell more than 1%, and the S&P 500 slipped.

title: Why Alphabet Stock Crashed Wednesday Morning
text: Alphabet's strong advertising revenue was overshadowed by weakness in its cloud segment. Investors fear the company has yet to capitalize on the booming market for artificial intelligence.

title: Alphabet Shares Tank On Cloud Earnings Miss But Analysts Say Investors Needn't Worry
text: Shares of Google parent Alphabet (GOOGL; GOOG) tumbled more than 9% in intraday trading Wednesday after the tech giant's cloud revenue fell short of expectations in the third quarter, despite a better-than-expected quarter overall. However, analysts say that Alphabet's cloud results shouldn't worry investors too much.

title: Alphabet's 3Q cloud growth miss sparks mixed analyst reactions
text: Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG)'s disappointing cloud growth forecast has Wall Street analysts divided on the outlook for the company's stock performance going forward.  Jeffries analysts seemed the most upbeat, believing the company's accelerating Search and YouTube growth will more than offset its slower cloud sales.

title: $240 billion gap widens between Microsoft and Google
text: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT)'s leading position in the artificial intelligence arms race and Google parent Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG)'s flailing position in the cloud computer space were central talking points in the latest tech earnings season. Microsoft, the world's second-largest megacap, impressed the market, with revenue up 13% year-over-year to $56.5 billion, driven by its cloud division and its adoption of AI services powered by partner OpenAI.

title: Google Expands AR Beauty Features to Mobile Browsers
text: Google has expanded the availability of its augmented reality (AR) beauty features by bringing them to mobile browsers. The tech giant introduced AR beauty features to enhance the online shopping experience nearly three years ago, Google said in a Wednesday (Oct.

title: Strong ad show from Alphabet, Snap puts the spotlight on Meta
text: A rebound in the advertising businesses of Google and Snap have signaled that the rising adoption of artificial intelligence was drawing marketers to digital platforms even in an uncertain economy, boding well for Facebook-parent Meta Platforms.

title: Is Alphabet Inc. (GOOG) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
text: The recommendations of Wall Street analysts are often relied on by investors when deciding whether to buy, sell, or hold a stock. Media reports about these brokerage-firm-employed (or sell-side) analysts changing their ratings often affect a stock's price.

title: GOOG Stock Price Predictions: What's Next for Alphabet After Mixed-Bag Earnings?
text: When Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG , NASDAQ: GOOGL ) reported its third-quarter results yesterday after the market closed, the conglomerate's top and bottom lines came in above analysts' average estimates. However, GOOG stock is falling in early trading because the financial results of its cloud unit were weaker than expected.

title: Alphabet's stock sinks toward worst day in a year after ‘evasive' earnings call
text: Alphabet Inc. shares GOOG, -8.51% GOOGL, -8.43% are on track to log their worst one-day performance in a year Wednesday in the wake of the company's latest earnings report, which brought a disappointing performance for the Google Cloud business. Alphabet's Class A shares were off 8.5% and on pace for their largest single-day drop since they shed 9.1% on Oct. 26, 2022.

title: Alphabet stock falls 8% on cloud miss as investors praise Microsoft Azure growth
text: Google's Cloud revenue miss came in stark contrast to Microsoft's earnings, which showed accelerated growth in its Intelligent Cloud business

title: Alphabet Stock Drops 6% on Google Cloud's Slowing Growth
text: Third-quarter revenue grew 11% year over year, beating the 4% growth Wall Street had expected. Earnings per share surged 46%, exceeding the 28% analysts had projected.

title: Google earnings just crushed two big bullish hopes for Alphabet's stock
text: There are three parts to the bull case for Alphabet Inc.'s stock, according to Bernstein analyst Mark Shmulik. But the Google parent company's latest earnings report may have crushed two of them — at least for a while.

title: 3 Red-Hot Growth Stocks That Are Still Cheap Buys
text: Vertex, Carnival, and Alphabet are all up sharply so far this year. Their shares, however, are still not trading at excessive valuations.

title: Alphabet Stock Set For Worst Day In 12 Months As Microsoft Again Asserts AI Lead

title: US stocks trade mixed after mega-cap tech earnings from Microsoft and Alphabet
text: US stocks were mixed on Wednesday as investors digested earnings from Microsoft and Alphabet. Microsoft posted strong cloud growth and saw its stock pop, while Alphabet fell after it reported lower-than-expected cloud revenue.

title: Google joins US-Australian partnership to expand internet access to remote Pacific nations
text: Google is set to embark on a major undersea cable project to provide internet access to eight remote Pacific Ocean nations. The endeavor, in collaboration with the United States and Australia, is poised to significantly expand Google's commercial operations in the region, targeting countries that have often struggled with limited connectivity.

title: Big Tech earnings can make or break this market
text: In an unstable economic climate marked by geopolitical unrest, concerns about the Federal Reserve and soaring Treasury yields, investors are closely watching this week's Big Tech earnings for clues about where the volatile stock market may head next.

title: Google And Microsoft Earnings Impress With Meta Scheduled To Report Tonight
text: We'll see if last night's earnings are enough to keep the market moving forward, or if there was reason for concern.

title: Microsoft ‘has taken the AI mantel from Google'—and now it's coming for Amazon in the cloud
text: Against a choppy economic backdrop for the broader software industry, Microsoft Corp. is still thriving.

title: Microsoft jumps while Google owner Alphabet slips as Wall Street zeroes in on the tech giants' AI efforts
text: Microsoft shares climbed 4% in premarket trading after a strong quarterly earnings report. Alphabet slipped 7% as revenue for its cloud division fell short of Wall Street's expectations.

title: Nasdaq called lower as investors digest Microsoft, Alphabet earnings
text: 7:00am: Nasdaq expected to open lower after mixed results US stocks are expected to open mixed, with tech stocks on the back foot as investors reflect on results from Google owner, Alphabet and Microsoft after Tuesday's close. In pre-market trading, futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were 0.2% higher, while those for the S&P 500 were down 0.3%, and contracts for the Nasdaq 100 futures fell 0.6%.

title: Microsoft surpasses Alphabet in cloud race with OpenAI bet, enterprise focus
text: Microsoft is outstripping Alphabet in the race to make money from generative artificial intelligence through early bets on OpenAI and focus on big clients, raising worries that the Google parent could lose share in the cloud-computing market.

title: Microsoft Gets Another Leg Up on Google in AI Race
text: Google's cloud business is slowing and weighing on earnings, while Microsoft's Azure is shaking off a slump.

title: Microsoft shares surge on bumper growth in cloud-computing unit as Alphabet stock drops on weak Google cloud results
text: Microsoft Corp. shares MSFT, +0.37% rallied 4% after the company posted better-than-expected growth in the company's Azure cloud-computing unit.

title: Microsoft Took Market Share from Google. How AI Is Changing Cloud Competition.
text: Microsoft's Azure impressed where Google Cloud disappointed and the reason behind the divergence looks to be in artificial intelligence.

title: S&P 500 futures slip as Google parent's slump offsets Microsoft advance
text: U.S. stock futures were mixed early Wednesday as a sharp decline in Alphabet shares counteracted a jump in Microsoft following earnings.

title: Google's ad sales growth accelerated in 3Q, but investors are unimpressed with the performance
text: Google's digital advertising sales growth accelerated during the summer, advancing a recent revival that helped its corporate parent Alphabet Inc. to deliver a quarterly profit that exceeded analysts' projections.
